job.name: &RUNLIST_ID;
job.command:
starver &STAR_VER; #stardev
#cp $FILELIST &OUT_DIR;/lists_run11/R&RUNLIST_ID;.lis cp &codePath;/runlists/&RUNLIST_ID; &OUT_DIR;/lists_run11/&RUNLIST_ID;.lis
setenv RUNLIST &OUT_DIR;/lists_run11/&RUNLIST_ID;.lis setenv OPTIONS `echo &STANA_OPTIONS; | sed 's/_/ /g'` setenv OPT_JETS `echo $OPTIONS | awk '{print index($0,"-j")}'` setenv COMMAND "./stana -f $RUNLIST $OPTIONS"
if ($OPT_JETS == 0) ln -s &OUT_DIR;/jets_run11/jets_&RUNLIST_ID;.root ln -s &codePath;/.sl53_gcc432 ln -s &codePath;/stana ls -al
echo echo "OUT_DIR: " &OUT_DIR; echo "codePath: " &codePath; echo "RUNLIST_ID: " &RUNLIST_ID; echo "STAR_VER: " &STAR_VER; echo "STANA_OPTIONS: " &STANA_OPTIONS; echo echo "STAR: " $STAR echo "FILELIST: " $FILELIST echo "RUNLIST: " $RUNLIST echo "OPTIONS: " $OPTIONS echo "OPT_JETS: " $OPT_JETS echo "SCRATCH: " $SCRATCH echo "pwd: " `pwd` echo "COMMAND: " $COMMAND echo
`$COMMAND`
# Remove link if ($OPT_JETS == 0) rm jets_&RUNLIST_ID;.root
